# TextureResource.Format.NormalEncoding

**Enumeration**

A profile that specifies the interpretation of pixel values as a normal.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NormalEncoding
```

## Normal profiles

- **TextureResource.Format.NormalEncoding.wy**: A normal map with the X and Y components of a surface normal in the tangent space of the surface that RealityKit encodes in the alpha and green channels of a texture.
- **TextureResource.Format.NormalEncoding.xy**: A normal map with the X and Y components of a surface normal in the tangent space of the surface that RealityKit encodes in the red and green channels of a texture.

## Defining the format profile

- **TextureResource.Format.ColorSpace**: A profile that specifies the interpretation of pixel values as a color.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
